title: Public Parking shall be limited to G + 4 and three basements
clause_text: Public Parking shall be limited to G + 4 and three basements.IX. The maximum cap on BUA per parking shall be 50 sq. m for LMVs, 65 sq. m for LCVs and 120 sq. m for HMVs/Buses. Incentive FSI shall be calculated as per BUA of the PPL, based on these norms or the actual BUA of the PPL, whichever is less. X. The developer of the PPL shall pay ‘premium’, worked out as per the following formula:
section: 33(18) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lots (PPL):
